metadata.title: USN-5833-1 -- python-future vulnerability
metadata.description: Sebastian Chnelik discovered that python-future incorrectly handled certain HTTP header field. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5833-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-future-doc - 0.15.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python3-future - 0.15.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python-future - 0.15.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
